Changes
=======

Version 0.1.1 (released 2015-12-11)
-----------------------------------

Improved features
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

- Delays the url_map building until first resolve request.

Version 0.1.0 (released 2015-11-18)
-----------------------------------

- Initial public release.
